ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory

Class NodeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory.NodeFactory

  • public class NodeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Give me name and namespace, I will create your node and prepare it for launching.
